Author: annielovesbacon
Text: YES this exact thing has happened to me once or twice. Last time, I didn’t eat for a whole week. It wasn’t like “I’m going to fast for seven days, I’m so determined!” but more just like... I didn’t feel like eating anymore. I had no desire and I didn’t really feel hungry. I eventually started eating again (obviously) but I can’t remember what exactly it was that changed my behavior.   Remember to drink lots of water — Gatorade is better, if you can. Those tiny bits of calories and electrolytes are really important. Sending love <3

Author: acrylakai
Text: This happened a long while ago to me. Lasted 3.5 weeks. Never happened again since and I pray for it all the time. I wish you luck. Remember to still drink water.
